snippet: As a group, the 2010 merlot wines released by the members of Merliance are showing great quality.
abstract: Howard G Goldberg Long Island Vines column reviews 2010 merlot wines from Long Island that support argument for making merlot region's signature red grape (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: As a group, the 2010 merlot wines released by the members of Merliance are showing great quality.

headline.print_headline: A Great Vintage For Merlot Grapes
headline.main: A Great Vintage for Merlot Grapes
